p: In vitro biocompatibility Cytotoxicity test NHDF from juvenile foreskin (PromoCell GmbH, VWR, Milan, Italy) were used. Cells between the second and fifth passage were employed for all the experiments. As growth medium (GM) Dulbeccoâ€™s Modified Eagle Medium (Lonza, Milan, Italy), supplemented with 10% fetal calf serum (Euroclone, Milan, Italy) and 200 IU/mL penicillin-0.2 mg/mL streptomycin (PBI International, Milan, Italy), was used.
